name: Tortilla Rollups IV
author: DOREENB
summary: These rollups are always a HUGE hit with the kids as well as the adults. A creamy, cheesy salsa mixture provides the filling. They are easy to make and may be prepared in advance.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package dry fiesta-style ranch dressing mix
directions: In a medium bowl, mix the cream cheese, sour cream, fiesta-style ranch dressing mix, chunky salsa and Cheddar cheese
Spread even amounts of the mixture onto the tortillas
Roll tortillas and chill in the refrigerator until ready to serve
To serve, slice the chilled, rolled tortillas into 3/4 inch slices and arrange on a large serving platter
